pull.title: tracing: Rename the `MIN` macro to `_TRACEPOINT_TEST_MIN` in log_raw_p2p_msgs
pull.body:
Inspired by: 00c1dbd26ddb816e5541c5724397015a92a3d06b (#31419)

Unless there's a reason we *don't* want the same change here...?
